mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.op_module AS opModule, a.op_type AS opType, a.op_desc AS opDesc, a.request_param AS requestParam, a.result_body AS resultBody, a.uri AS uri, a.method AS method, a.op_user AS opUser, a.login_ip AS loginIp, a.tenant_id AS tenantId, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks
